alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued July 12 at 2:28AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from consistent rainfall in the last couple of hours has been observed on satellite imagery and rain total here at the Weather Station. WHERE...all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through 530 am SST IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 228 VAVEAO ASO LUA IULAI 12 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mo nai isi itula ua mavae atu, ma o lo`o va`aia fo`i i luga o ata satelite fa`apea le faitau aofa`i o fa`aputuga timu ua fa`amaumauina i le Ofisa Va`ai Tau. NOFOAGA...mo motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 530 i le taeao o le Aso AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
